javadoc:
Represents a connection between a producer tool and a
 consumer tool.

methods.javadoc: Get the tool that produces an event.
methods.name: getProducer
methods.comment: Get the tool that produces an event.

methods.javadoc: Get the tool that consumes an event.
methods.name: getConsumer
methods.comment: Get the tool that consumes an event.

methods.javadoc:
Get the list of event names that is an intersection
 between what the producer produces and what the
 consumers consumes.
@return an array of event names
methods.name: getEvents
methods.comment:
Get the list of event names that is an intersection
 between what the producer produces and what the
 consumers consumes.

methods.name: connect
methods.comment: Connect the tools for the given event name.

methods.name: disconnect
methods.comment:
Break the connection between the tools for the
 given event name.

methods.name: isConnected
methods.comment:
Return whether the tools are connected for the
 given event name.

return.comment: true if the tools are connected by eventName.

name: ToolConnection
comment:
Represents a connection between a producer tool and a
 consumer tool.
